headline: ROLLINS, INC. NAMES WILLIAM HARKINS AS CHIEF ACCOUNTING OFFICER
summary: Rollins, Inc. (NYSE:ROL) ("Rollins" or the "Company"), has named William (Will) Harkins as Chief Accounting Officer, effective March 17, 2025. Mr. Harkins joins Rollins from Mohawk Industries, Inc., where he served as Chief Accounting Officer and Corporate Controller. Throughout his career, he has held leadership positions with Mars, Incorporated and The Coca-Cola Company. During his 14-year tenure at The Coca-Cola Company he took on roles of increasing responsibility, including leading the Corp
